thag7.1:5.1: Adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag7.1:5.2: with her garland and her makeup on,
thag7.1:5.3: and her feet so brightly rouged:
thag7.1:6.1: Stepping off her sandals in front of me,
thag7.1:7.5: I promise this is the truth—
thag7.1:7.6: I swear it by the Sacred Flame.
thag7.1:8.1: And when we’ve grown old together,
thag7.1:8.2: both of us leaning on staffs,
thag7.1:9.1: I saw the courtesan seducing me,
thag7.1:9.3: adorned with jewelry and all dressed up,
thag7.1:9.4: like a snare of death laid down.
thag7.1:11.2: see the excellence of the Dhamma!
